'''Harding of [[Hobbiton Hill|the Hill]]''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[The Shire]].

== History ==
Harding was the son of [[Holfast Gardner]] and a great-grandson of [[Samwise Gamgee]], the hero of the [[War of the Ring]].<ref name=tree>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref> He became known as "of the Hill".<ref group=note>Considering that Harding was the grandson of Samwise's eldest son, he should have become Samwise's heir and head of the [[Gardner Family]], and presumably would have inherited [[Bag End]], hence the epithet.</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name '''''Harding''''' comes from [[Old English]] ''hearding'' ("hard one, strong one").<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names</ref>
